attributes.action: Make the 28th May National 'Kylie Minogue' Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kylie Minogue turns 21 (again) on the 28th May. To mark this auspicious occasion, we ask Tony Blair as one of his final acts as Prime Minister to make the 28th May National 'Kylie' Day, so this great nation can celebrate her birthday every year. It is further requested that he announce this at the Kylie Birthday Party in aid of Cancer Research taking place at the Gardening Club, Covent Garden from 6pm to 11pm on May 28th. Unfortunately he will be required to pay the £5 entry fee as all proceeds go to charity.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
